text:
Warning to all Shopee buyers: Do not use this as your Shopee Collection Point.

If you are in the area, use Ace Dymanic Holdings Pte. Ltd. @ 933 Upper Changi Road North instead.

My version of events are listed in my Return/Refund request to Shopee. It's very irritating when the shop says their closing time is at 10pm (verified by the Condominium's guardhouse) while I'm denied request to collect my parcel slightly before 9.30pm.

Reasons cited by the lady owner is that she's closing her shop, but in fact, another customer had just made purchases and walked out. I just needed to collect my item before catching a flight. Would that be very difficult?

Fyi, I had used Shopee Collection Points in other areas like Paya Lebar/Geylang and the shops have always been so accommodating (even when I turned up 5 min before closing). What more 30 min before closing time here at RDK Mini Mart?

To Shopee, I don't this shop deserves your commission. Please delist them. Your buyers would save the inconvenience I faced.

Wonderful experience!!! Great customer service . I went around 11:30 pm for shoppee pick up the owner of the shop was very humble cleaning store and locked it , on my request he opened the shop and gave my shoppee parcel . Did not expect that gesture but I was very happy â€¦. Great experience and understanding shop owner .

Very very friendly! Collected shopee parcel and bought some groceries.
Glad to be able to buy some basic household items without taking a bus!
Very nice and beautiful collection near by
